document_data.name: Whirlchain
document_data.mainbody: '''''Whirlchain''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[evocation]] spell that created a [[chain]] that battered one's foe.
document_data.Effect: The spell conjured a chain around the target creature in a helix fashion, that then whipped and battered the victim before disappearing.
document_data.Components: The spell required a metal chain of any kind and any length longer than the caster's own hand.
document_data.History: The ''whirlchain'' spell appeared within the ''[[Tome of Torment]]'', the holiest book of the [[church of Ilmater]], which first appeared in the Realms in [[848 DR]].
